data.message: Facebook Video processor sucks! Too much compression resulting in Poor Audio quality. No wonder people prefer linking cover songs, video presentation on Youtube. Only video will be processed,  Audio remain good quality.

replies.message: We’re sorry to hear that you had this experience, Jonathan. If you have any feedback you'd like to share with our team, please let us know here: http://bit.ly/1Yov4YR. Feedback from our community helps us continue to improve Facebook for everyone. -Kristin
